found to be approximately 3.2 ppt/year in Andhra Pradesh and 0.05 ppt/year in Orissa. This 
data represents changes among programme participants rather than among community 
members as a whole. The underlying trend in underweight prevalence was estimated to be 
2.8 ppt/year in Orissa and 4.2 ppt/year in Andhra Pradesh. Overestimation of the underlying 
trend may have caused an underestimation of the effectiveness of ICDS I in Andhra Pradesh.
